original_title: IODINE – Η Ελλάδα στα ερείπια του Μεσολογγίου
overview: Ιnspired by Delacroix’s painting “Greece. on the Ruins of Missolonghi”, the filmmaker visits this lagoon-bound town. He records his thoughts, the daily life of the youths, he converses with local artists and poets in search of a connection between the painting and contemporary Missolonghi.
title: IODINE – Greece on the Ruins of Missolonghi
